div.pre: 1950 Monteparano, 15 km. E of Taranto, (704) Calabria, 1905 Burial: c. 300 B.C. (K) Contents: 13 AV, c. 300 AR Taras: 12 AV st. (as Evans, pl. 5, 2 [1]; 4 [1]; 9 [10]) 1 AV dr. (as BMC 16) many AR st. (Per. V) Metapontum: 1 dist. Thurium: 1 dist. Disposition: Taranto 1 AV; Jameson 1 AV (Cat. 148); Vlasto 4 AV (Cat. 3 [= J. Hirsch Dec. 6, 1906, 16], 4, 21, 26), 33 AR (Cat. 564, 566, 568-9, 571-4, 576-7, 579-80, 582, 585-6, 589-90, 595-6, 602, 606, 608, 613, 626-8, 630, 632, 936-7, 646, 652, 665); J, Hirsch May 28, 1906, 362; Sambon Dec. 19, 1907, 14; and perhaps J. Hirsch May 24, 1910, 168 and de Sartiges Cat. 19 [= Santamaria Apr. 6, 1908, 28] Vlasto, NC 1930, p. 141, note 42 A note from Vlasto in the ANS catalogues the gold coins, and states that the attribution of Jameson 159 to this hd. is in error
